channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @WichitaCindy it's true, but it goes back further. we never purged slavery from america.
@wmf or maybe he's just a greedy sob like the rest.
What Texas Gains by Investigating Twitterâ€™s Fake Accounts. https://t.co/lCgh1efEUu
Supreme Court: Armed man arrested near Brett Kavanaugh home. https://t.co/3N2d2B1gJC

Guns are scary, and they divide the country and have for a long time. And there are absolutely correct answers, things we could do that would lower the death and incapacity rates. But compare that to our dealing with Covid...
How could a country that has digested over a million Covid deaths in the last two years, and even now hasn't done anything to slow the virus, really stop anything when we can't do what it takes to stop the virus.
@johnrobb that's probably someone's mother.
@brettglass this isn't new functionality, it's just refactoring to make it easier for developers. exactly the same level of security as currently exists.

A Washington Post reporter RTd a not horribly sexist joke. His colleague posted a complaint, publicly, and the roof caves in on him. He deleted the tweet and apologized. He gets suspended. She couldâ€™ve sent a DM or posted something on their slack. So who did the worse thing?
I asked Alexa to play some music, and this is the song she picked. https://t.co/WUPKQxEH2L
I got the Echo Studio for $179. It's very nice. Big bass. https://t.co/teANmqFfQU
2000: Bootstrapping the Two-Way-Web. https://t.co/AGZ38agSYH
Long COVID threat extends far beyond pandemic. https://t.co/nhW2liTrX8
Apple's new CarPlay software replaces your car's clunky interface â€” and it's our best look at what Apple's eventual car could look like. https://t.co/7S9HvyTCBM
Nimbus launches tiny EV prototype thatâ€™s like a motorbike with a roof. https://t.co/mg5YEItaIX
Ford surprises F-150 Lightning owners with accessory that can recharge stranded Teslas. https://t.co/u2yko6P30W
@anildash heh wait a few more years, it gets even more interesting. ðŸ˜€

If you want to write a Twitter app, this is all you need to know. It's a lot. It could be made much simpler. If it were made simpler, Twitter would create a new kind of web. We've never had a scriptable web-scale resource like Twitter. https://t.co/ORXKAR5nEg
2000: The Two-Way Web. https://t.co/PgCtltFZlp
@hazelslade_wolf @woodstockfest I think it's Alvin Lee too.
Maybe Fox doesn't want to air the hearings because Fox is implicated.
A Twitter hello world app. https://t.co/ORXKAR5nEg

"I guess all the military-style equipment Republicans constantly funnel to the police really is just meant to shoot gas canisters at unarmed protesters outside a Target, not to subdue a lone gunman systematically executing children and teachers." https://t.co/KAtq3U4XWn
@codexeditor @phonetonote BTW, if you want to tell me about your work, I'd be interested in knowing what you're doing. Maybe it can connect to some of what I've got here.
@kidehen The only people who say that Twitter and FB are web 2.0 are the promoters of web3.
